column5: I think I might hit up Rice for the very first time on the hardwater! Anyone else heading to the Bewdley area, and possibly want to meet up? I've got a portable hut and such.  PM me if you might be interested.
Let me know how you boys do out there.  Was out today and not even a single bite.  Haven't tried Bo-diddly yet though.   Good Luck!
Oh really?? Where were you? Gores?
Yeah tried a couple spots on gores and tried the gap in harwood.  The gap is actually open water but the ice near it is 6+ inches.  But be careful none the less round there if ya go.
